name: mqtt_client
description: MQTT client for home automation integration. Publishes Volumio state and receives playback commands via MQTT.
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: MQTT client for home automation integration (Home Assistant, OpenHAB, Node-RED, etc.). Publishes Volumio playback state to configurable MQTT topics and receives commands for playback control, volume adjustment, and queue management. Supports TLS/SSL with client certificates.
volumio_info.changelog: v1.0.1 - Initial release with full playback control, state publishing, TLS support, and group topics.
